mapper.insert: insert into employee( emp_no, emp_name, emp_password, emp_email, emp_phone, emp_address, emp_detail_address, emp_postcode, emp_hire_date, is_leave, cp_number, job_no, dept_no, emp_admin ) values( #{empNo}, #{empName}, #{empPassword} , #{empEmail}, #{empPhone}, #{empAddress}, #{empDetailAddress}, #{empPostcode}, #{empHireDate}, 'N', #{cpNumber}, #{jobNo}, #{deptNo}, 'N' )
mapper.select: select * from employee where emp_no = #{empNo}
select EMP.*, IMG.attachment_no from employee EMP left outer join emp_profile IMG on EMP.emp_no = IMG.emp_no where is_leave = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee where is_leave = 'N'
select * from search_info where instr(${column}, #{keyword}) > 0 and is_leave = 'N' order by ${column} asc
select*from department order by dept_no asc

select * from search_info where dept_no = #{deptNo} and is_leave = 'N'
and instr(emp_name, #{empName}) >0
order by job_no desc
select max(emp_no) from employee where emp_no like concat(#{year}, '%')
select emp_email from employee where emp_no = #{empNo} and emp_email = #{empEmail}
select * from search_info where emp_admin = 'Y' order by emp_no asc
select * from search_info where instr(${column}, #{keyword}) > 0 and emp_admin = 'Y' order by ${column} asc
select * from search_info where is_leave = 'D'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM search_info where is_leave = 'D'
SELECT * FROM search_info WHERE is_leave = 'D' AND instr(${column}, #{keyword}) > 0 ORDER BY ${column} ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee where is_leave = 'Y'
select * from search_info where is_leave = 'Y'
select distinct * from search_info where instr(${column}, #{keyword}) > 0 and is_leave = 'Y' order by ${column} asc
select emp_name from employee where emp_no=#{empNo}
